title: Sales Associate - NYC Luxury Retail
description:
Premium Retail Solutions NYC is a leading provider of luxury retail services and customer experience management. We're seeking talented Sales Associates to join our dynamic team in our flagship Manhattan location.

About Us:
Premium Retail Solutions NYC is a rapidly growing company specializing in high-end retail operations management and customer service excellence. We partner with top luxury brands to deliver exceptional shopping experiences. We've been recognized as an industry leader for our innovative approach to retail customer engagement and team development.

Position Overview:
As a Sales Associate, you'll be at the forefront of our customer service strategy, delivering exceptional experiences that drive sales and build customer loyalty. This is a fast-paced role in a high-volume retail environment where your ability to connect with customers and close sales directly impacts our success.

Key Responsibilities:
- Actively engage with customers on the sales floor to understand their needs and recommend products
- Achieve and exceed individual sales targets and store goals
- Maintain in-depth product knowledge across our luxury brand portfolio
- Process transactions accurately using our POS system
- Build and maintain lasting customer relationships through excellent communication
- Collaborate with team members to ensure smooth store operations
- Maintain visual merchandising standards and store cleanliness
- Handle customer inquiries and resolve concerns professionally
- Track inventory and communicate stock levels to management

Required Qualifications:
- Minimum 2 years of sales or customer service experience
- Proven track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills
- Excellent organizational and time management abilities
- Must be available for flexible scheduling including evenings, weekends, and holidays
- Ability to stand for extended periods
- Professional appearance and demeanor
- High school diploma or equivalent

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience in luxury retail or high-end customer service environments
- Knowledge of CRM systems (Salesforce experience is a plus)
- Bilingual abilities (Spanish or Mandarin preferred)
- Previous experience with mobile POS systems
- Understanding of fashion and luxury brand aesthetics
- Certification in customer service excellence or similar programs

Skills Required:
- Customer service expertise
- Sales technique proficiency
- Conflict resolution abilities
- Active listening
- Cash handling experience
- Product knowledge retention
- Attention to detail
- Team collaboration
- Problem-solving mindset
- Adaptability to retail environment

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive base salary: $28,000 - $35,000 annually
- Performance-based bonuses and commission opportunities
- Employee discount on luxury brand merchandise (20-30%)
- Health insurance (medical, dental, vision coverage)
- 401(k) retirement plan with company matching
- Paid time off (PTO)
- Professional development and training programs
- Career advancement opportunities within our growing organization
- Flexible work schedules for qualified candidates

Work Environment:
- Fast-paced luxury retail store (8,000+ sq ft flagship location)
- High foot traffic and customer volume
- Temperature-controlled indoor environment
- Collaborative team culture
- Exposure to cutting-edge retail technology
- Regular interaction with diverse clientele from around the world

Equal Opportunity:
Premium Retail Solutions NYC is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
